name: ms-api-location
description: The location microservice of location project

scripts.start: cross-env LOGGING_CONSOLE_LEVEL=debug LOGGING_FILE_LEVEL=debug LOGGING_DB_LEVEL=error LOGGING_SAVE_REQUESTS=true LOGGING_USE_DB=false nodemon server.js
scripts.test: cross-env LIMIT_WAITING=0 IN_TEST=/mock/ LANGUAGE=en LOGGING_CONSOLE_LEVEL=debug LOGGING_FILE_LEVEL=debug LOGGING_DB_LEVEL=error LOGGING_SAVE_REQUESTS=true LOGGING_USE_DB=false nyc --reporter=html --reporter=text-summary --all ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- -R spec --recursive --timeout 120000

author: Paulo Francisco
